name: RITZ PB and Banana Bumblebees
author: RITZ Crackers
summary: Ritz crackers spread with peanut butter are topped with banana slices, stripes of chocolate, and red grape sections to make 'bumblebee' snacks.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons chocolate spread, room temperature
directions: Spread peanut butter onto crackers; top each with 1 banana slice
Spoon chocolate spread into resealable plastic bag; cut small piece off one bottom corner of bag
Use to pipe horizontal lines onto banana slices to resemble bumble bee bodies
Cut remaining banana slices in half; place next to banana slices on crackers for the bees' wings
Add grapes for the bees' heads
